title: doc: dead link in go_faq.html
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!

1. What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?

N/A

2. What operating system and processor architecture are you using (`go env`)?

N/A\

3. What did you do?

Went to https://golang.org/doc/faq#Why_does_Go_perform_badly_on_benchmark_x and clicked on reverse-complement.go link [here](https://github.com/golang/go/blob/d20b92e07a9462bf7eb43d25389b70528140f7d5/doc/go_faq.html#L1825)

4. What did you expect to see?

Not a 404

5. What did you see instead?

A 404
